descriptionHtml:
Craftable \'Daedric Artifacts\' by Seppochi 
ლ(ಠ益ಠლ) Y U NO DOWNLOAD & RATE?!
.........................................................................................................................................................................

Ever made a bad choice, or don\'t just want to kill innocent people for Daedric Artifacts ?

This mod makes it possible to craft Artifacts, after completing the Daedric Quest. This mod affects only certain artifacts.

Azura Star/Black Star
Mehrunes Razor
Skull of Corruption
Hircines Ring/Savior Hide
Ring of Namira
Rueful Axe/Masque of Clavicus (Soon forgot those)

Mehrunes Razor Requires Pieces of the Past Completed, and all Commentaries of Mythic Dawn.
Azura Star and Black Star req. only themselves, if you made a bad choice in first time, you can use your Star to create the other one.
Skull of Corruption requires unique robes, dropped by Thorek and Veren in Nightcaller Temple
Hircine ring and Savior hide, same as Azura Star.
Ring of Namira requires Eola\'s Sword, if u decide to kill her in the hall f the dead or in Namiras shrine you can craft it.
author: Seppochi
